info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 16 at 10:39AM CDT until June 18 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Aberdeen SD
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Aberdeen SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota...
Little Minnesota River near Peever affecting Roberts County.
.For sites with a river forecast, the forecast includes precipitation through the next 24 hours. Any future precipitation could affect the forecasts.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Little Minnesota River near Peever.
* WHEN...From this morning to early Wednesday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Left bank below gage begins flooding.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Monday the stage was 17.1 feet and rising very slowly. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM CDT Monday was 17.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 11.8 feet Monday, June 23. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr.
The next statement will be issued by Tuesday evening at 645 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING
